attributes.action: Cancel GCSE/Vocational exams for year 10 use Coursework and Teacher assessment
attributes.additional_details:
My son is due to take his Business exam on the first of February and has only had 6 weeks of in school teaching since March. How is this fair?
Cancel exams for year 10 students and use Coursework and teacher assessment
attributes.background: Stop GCSE and vocational exams for year 10 students and use Coursework and Teacher assessment for grades

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549147
